mapper.insert: insert into comments(book_id, content, rating, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) VALUES (#{bookId},#{content},#{rating}, #{createTime},#{createUser},#{updateTime},#{updateUser})
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(rating) FROM comments WHERE book_id = #{bookId}

select * from book
and title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and author like concat('%',#{author},'%')
and isbn like concat('%',#{isbn},'%')
and category like concat('%',#{category},'%')

select * from book
and rating BETWEEN #{rating} - 0.1 AND #{rating} + 0.1
and YEAR(publishDate) BETWEEN YEAR(#{publishDate}) - 1 AND YEAR(#{publishDate}) + 1
and category = #{category}
